title: The Koran (Qurʼân) / translated by E.H. Palmer ; with an introduction by R.A. Nicholson.
Kurʾan-ı Kerim tercümesi / mütercim ve tabii, Cemil Sait.

The Koran, commonly called the Alkoran of Mohammed. Translated into English from the original Arabic by George Sale, with explanatory notes selected by Frederic Mynon Cooper. To which is prefixed a life of Mohammed.
